StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAssignQSNApprovals]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgUnitID int = 0, @FromDate date.me = null, @ToDate date.me = null, @LastName varchar(15) = null, @FirstName varchar(15) = null, @SSN varchar(9) = null, @Status varchar(15) = null )AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT L.LeadID, Recruit.FirstName as RecruitFirstName, Recruit.LastName as RecruitLastName, Recruit.SSN as RecruitSSN, (PR.Title + ' ' + PR.LastName) as RecruiterName, Status = CASE WHEN AP.QSNApproved_Date IS NOT NULL THEN 'Approved' ELSE 'Pending' END, QSNSelected_Date as Ini.alDate, QSNApproved_Date as LastDate FROM [dbo].[Lead] L INNER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] AP on AP.LeadID = L.LeadID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Recruit] R ON R.RecruitID = L.RecruitID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Person] Recruit ON Recruit.PersonID = R.PersonID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Recruiter] ON Recruiter.RecruiterID = L.AssignedRecruiterID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Person] PR ON PR.PersonID = Recruiter.PersonID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON l.AtachedPSRSSID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS
WHERE ( orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (Recruit.FirstName LIKE @FirstName + '%' OR @FirstName IS NULL) AND (Recruit.LastName LIKE @LastName + '%' OR @LastName IS NULL) AND (Recruit.SSN LIKE @SSN OR @SSN IS NULL) AND (QSNSelected_Date IS NOT NULL OR QSNApproved_Date IS NOT NULL) ) dt_qsn_assign_approvals WHERE (Status = @Status OR @Status = 'All') AND ( (@Status = 'Pending' AND ( (@FromDate IS NOT NULL AND @ToDate IS NOT NULL AND Ini.alDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) OR (@FromDate IS NOT NULL and @ToDate IS NULL AND Ini.alDate > @FromDate) OR (@FromDate IS NULL and @ToDate IS NOT NULL AND Ini.alDate < @ToDate) ) ) OR (@Status = 'Approved' AND ( (@FromDate IS NOT NULL AND @ToDate IS NOT NULL AND LastDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) OR (@FromDate IS NOT NULL and @ToDate IS NULL AND LastDate > @FromDate) OR (@FromDate IS NULL and @ToDate IS NOT NULL AND LastDate < @ToDate) ) ) OR (@ToDate IS NULL AND @FromDate IS NULL) OR (@Status = 'All') )
